author: Rachel Torgerson
title: Dakota Johnson Wears Victorian Dress to the 2017 Oscars – Dakota Johnson Academy Awards Red Carpet

organizations.name: dakota johnson academy awards red carpet getty advertisement - continue reading below dakota johnson

text: Getty Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Dakota Johnson looked like she stepped right out of a Victorian novel on the Oscars red carpet. Her pale gold silk Gucci dress was giving off major vintage vibes with is high, ruffled collar, long sleeves and pouffy shoulders. It also featured a large bow on the front and train for a little extra ~drama~. Getty Dakota kept her hair and makeup simple and accessorized her look with a large gold and diamond statement necklace, which added a fresh, modern element to the vintage-y look. Getty Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Coming off of her sexy stint in Fifty Shades Darker, this covered up Victorian situation is a little unexpected. Way to keep everyone on their toes, Dakota! Get non-boring fashion and beauty news directly in your feed. Follow Facebook.com/CosmoBeauty . Follow Rachel on Twitter and Instagram .
